author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

This is the PR for the `master` branch, which will then be backported to `12_3_X` (which is currently the release used for HLT-menu development for Run 3).

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - Part of [CMSHLT-2261](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2261): [BPH] Update of low-mass dimuon triggers for Run 3.
  - [CMSHLT-2286](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2286): [EGM] Removal of "caloTowers" from E/Gamma reconstruction at HLT.
  - [CMSHLT-2293](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2293): [EGM] Update for Run-3 E/Gamma supercluster energy regression.

The configurations were created with [`V03-03-00` of ConfDB](https://github.com/cms-sw/hlt-confdb/releases/tag/V03-03-00), which introduces support for `ProcessAcceleratorCUDA`.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X` [`12_4_X`]
